twinkle.name: Twinkle
twinkle.description: Choose a color and randomly toggle the brightness of each LED on the board.

programmable.name: Programmable
programmable.description: Update each LED via a restful interface programmatically.

solid-color.name: Solid Color
solid-color.description: Fill the board with one solid color.

text.name: Text
text.description: Display any text with a specific color and font.

marquee.name: Marquee
marquee.description: Display scrolling text with a specific color and font.

unsupported.name: Unsupported
unsupported.description: When a macro can't be found, this is macro is used.
